product_name: Perseus Book Group (Pbg) Rick Steves' Italy - 2014
long_description: Make the most of your trip with the 2014 edition of Rick Steves' Italy. It takes you from the best museums to dining in out-of-the way restaurants and includes a full-color fold out map.
short_description: Make the most of your trip with the 2014 edition of Rick Steves' Italy. It takes you from the best museums to dining in out-of-the way restaurants and includes a full-color fold out map.
